page.title: 11RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: LEISURE TIME PRESENTS NO PROBLEM TO THE CHILDREN AND ADULTS OF APPLEDORE, CHILDREN RIDE THEIR BICYCLES AROUND APPLEDORE, PLAY IN THE RECREATION FEILD ON THE SWINGS AND SLIDE,THEY ALSO LOVE PLAYING IN EACH OTHERS GARDEN,DURING THE WINTER MONTHS THEY TEND TO PLAY INDOORS AND WATCH MORE T.V.TEENAGERS FREQUENT THE VILLAGE PUBS,AND SUPPORT THE DISCOS AT THE VILLAGE HALL,BUT MANY SEEK PLEASURES BEYOND THE VILLAGE IN THE LOCAL TOWNS,REACHED MAINLY BY MOTER BIKE.ALL AGES ENGAGE IN FISHING AND ENJOY RURAL DELIGHTS OF THE CANAL AND THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE BUT MANY SEEKING PLEASURES BEYOND THE LOCAL ENVIRONMENT.THEY HAVE BINGO HELD WEEKLY,WHIST DRIVES AND DISCOS HELD REGULARLY AND THE HARVEST SUPPER HELD ANNUALY.
